getNotAP

PURPOSE

getNotAP Create negation of APs in env

SYNOPSIS

function env = getNotAP(env)

DESCRIPTION 

 getNotAP Create negation of APs in env

 Input: 'env' struct with all APs
 Output: 'env' struct with all notAPs (negated)

 :copyright: 2014 by the California Institute of Technology
 :license: BSD 3-Clause, see LICENSE for details

  • envPt2Pt envPt2Pt Creates environment (workspace)

0001 function env = getNotAP(env)
0002 % getNotAP Create negation of APs in env
0003 %
0004 % Input: 'env' struct with all APs
0005 % Output: 'env' struct with all notAPs (negated)
0006 %
0007 % :copyright: 2014 by the California Institute of Technology

0009 
0010 fields = fieldnames(env.AP);
0011 for i = 1:length(fields)
0012     notAP = regiondiff(env.work.workspace, env.AP.(fields{i}));
0013     env.notAP.(fields{i}) = notAP;
0014 end
0015     
0016 end
